metadata.name: Planetarium Chance
metadata.description:
Displays the chance of a planetarium being present (on the current floor) in the HUD. Takes into account all items, collectibles and modifiers.
[b][u]----------READ THE DESCRIPTION BEFORE COMMENTING!!!----------[/u][/b]
[i]items that affect the chance of a planetarium spawn will not show until you enter the next floor, as your current floor layout will not change.[/i]
[hr][/hr]
[h1]Configuring the HUD offset:[/h1]
1: Start a run 2: [u]Do not[/u] have your game paused in any way (debug menu / pause screen etc.) 3: Press "[b]shift+J[/b]" or "[b]shift+K[/b]" to decrease / increase the hud offset
This is due to a limitation in the modding API, where mods cannot read the options.ini file or access any variable that contains the in-game HUD offset value. An integration with mod config menu will be coming soon™
[hr][/hr]
Make sure you have the requirements unlocked to be able to actually see the planetarium.
Bear in mind 99.9% doesn't guarantee a spawn: "Note that the bonuses are additive (not multiplicative) and can reach 100%. However, only an attempt by the game to generate a Planetarium is guaranteed: they have the lowest priority in level generation and if the level does not have enough space, the room will not be placed. However, the bonus will remain intact for a later level if any remain." - https://bindingofisaacrebirth.fandom.com/wiki/Planetarium
[hr][/hr]
Have any ideas? Found a bug? visit the mod repository @ https://github.com/Sectimus/isaac-planetarium-chance/issues
⦿*co-op past 2 players may not be display correctly.* ⦿*Mod config menu support coming soon!* ⦿*Colours may be slightly off, if anyone wants to provide the source values (as well as opacacy) please submit a pull request.* ⦿*R-Key item may show an incorrect number when used*
